html:
3.15.21  1:31 am   ever since the pandemic, i have lost all motivation to play my instrument for school. what should i do

      would you like to play it for other reasons

3.15.21  12:28 am   is math related to philosophy

      yes

3.14.21  11:16 pm   What time is it like right now

      Monday, March 15, 2021 10:08:32 PM

3.14.21  11:14 pm   did you have pie today 

      no

3.14.21  11:02 pm   what car should i buy

      regular

3.14.21  10:43 pm   I'm dropping out of college in May. What do I do with my life after that?

      you could teach the world everything you know

3.14.21  8:12 pm   my brain is funny, help?

      you may have an opportunity to help others with less funny brains

3.14.21  6:41 pm   Do you ever decide to change the key of a song you are writing?

      yes

3.14.21  6:23 pm   i'm worried that by taking music lessons i'm teaching my brain to think what's 'right' and 'wrong' in music? are there rights and wrongs in music,

     it's music's job to hypnotize you into thinking different things are right or wrong, on an evolving moment to moment basis

     and is this something i should be worried about?

     the main thing to worry about is whether or not you should be worried

3.14.21  2:35 pm   Can a song be perfect?

      if you made it perfect then it wouldn't be called a song anymore

3.14.21  2:16 pm   Do you use traditional classical music theory or jazz theory?

     which is the one where you get to have notes and chords etc

     Have you come up with your own system?

     yes but, it is close cousins with the system generally used on the 'Earth' planet, over the course of the past 300 years or so

     If so, how does it work? 

     eternally mysterious as music remains to this day, one thing i'm sure of is: the core principle seems to be about 'making patterns and breaking them'. This seems to apply to more than just music. But, what music adds to this, in addition, is pitches, which clearly have some nice relationships, which help to enrich the pattern making/breaking process to a level that is so deeply subliminal i feel you could spend 1000 lifetimes trying to figure out exactly how the heck it actually works. But, again, what i will say is, regardless of what seems 'known' or 'unknown', or 'right' or 'wrong', it becomes unnecessary to choose between the two, because what seems to always power the whole thing is this 'making patterns and breaking them' phenomenon. so given that, finding what's "right" and "wrong" becomes an ellusive chase which never yields a static answer. you just have to keep playing the game. which also happens to be very serious

3.14.21  2:12 pm   Could you describe your next song in two words?

      i'd prefer to use more than 2 words, and sing them, with other musical accompaniment

3.14.21  1:21 pm   when you are about to release a video how much stress is there over making sure everything goes right?

     a lot, but what makes it worse is that it's actually impossible to get anything right

      every time I leave my house I panic over forgetting something so I can only imagine the level of panic

3.14.21  11:27 am   what is your new song about?

     wistfulness, listlessness, wishfulness,

     btw, love your videos!

3.14.21  9:35 am   what do I do if I write the beginning of a song, but don't know what to do next?

      try imagining a scene in your mind. sometimes that helps

3.14.21  9:17 am   are you telling us not to eat breakfast?

     no

      if so when should we eat

3.14.21  7:34 am   When will your song will come

      right away

3.14.21  4:46 am   what is your favorite food?

      regular

3.14.21  4:46 am   Thoughts on the plastic on the outside of an electrical outlet? 

      helps keep the electricity inside

3.14.21  4:37 am   how to read

      i'm not sure

3.14.21  4:25 am   Do you ever feel like revisiting a song and doing something more? or a little less? or remixed?

      there's many other things i have yet to make for the first time, so i should take care of those first, then maybe circle back for the re-makes

3.14.21  1:51 am   What was your inspiration behind here comes the sun?

      the sun

3.14.21  12:12 am   will the next video be a song?

     yes

     and approximately how long will it be?

     3 minutes and 22 seconds

      love your content, thanks for all you do

3.13.21  10:25 pm   what vibe would you use to describe yourself in a job interview 

      normal

3.13.21  8:39 pm   YOU ARE THE MOST LIFE AFFIRMING PERSON EVER

      i am working on ways to affirm it more

3.13.21  7:25 pm   Is music magic?

      yes

3.13.21  5:18 pm   my creativity is feeling stifled by the people i'm living with, but moving out isn't really an option right now. what should i do?

      how about sending some emails

3.13.21  5:17 pm   why do you only animate with linear easing

      linear is not easing, but, when i do need easing, i prefer my own hand to be at the helm

3.13.21  3:00 pm   Did you think of the "ne ne neng nang neng" parts of Here Comes The Sun during the writing phase or production phase?

      that was during the writing, specifically the august 2020 re-write

3.13.21  1:49 pm   Are there other goals you wish to achieve that you haven't had the chance to yet?

     yes

     Could you give us an example or hint of 1?

     being reasonable

3.13.21  12:41 pm   do you concern yourself with the narrative of your lyrics?

      sure

3.13.21  11:06 am   do you ever worry about running out of chords?

     no, because it's ok and good to use the same chords twice

     what would you do in that situation?

      make songs

3.13.21  8:50 am   why do your songs bop so hard 

      this is a form of self defense

3.13.21  7:58 am   did you post the video for here comes the sun the same day you finished it?

      almost

3.13.21  6:08 am   What would you say is the purpose of music?

      to get you

3.13.21  3:03 am   What's your most controversial political opinion?  

      everyone is neighbors

3.13.21  2:20 am   what is your favourite paradox

      things making sense

3.13.21  1:41 am   what inspired you to make music in the style you do?

      i'm just trying to be ..... sensible

3.13.21  1:04 am   Bill, the surface of my table rocks a bit. How do I fix this?

      try putting some goo under it

3.12.21  11:31 pm   When I try to make sense of it all it just makes less sense...Why does anything make sense?

      you requested this

3.12.21  11:27 pm   it feels like every niche has already been filled

      it's always felt like that, but it's never been true

3.12.21  11:01 pm   As a self-taught musician how did you teach yourself to solo so well? Any pointers on keys specifically would be appreciated.

      i think the best first thing you can do is accept the responsibility that you can truly play whatever you want, during the whole duration of your alloted time. This is a big responsibility, and may be a terrifying realization. but it should also blow your mind with excitement and make you want to embark on a 1000 year journey to figure out what you actually do want to play

3.12.21  10:50 pm   Any advice on making particular parts of poetry more poignant, potent, and powerful?

      imagine some scenes

3.12.21  9:57 pm   Do you just make up your lyrics on the fly or do you write them down first?

      make them up on the fly, then write them down. and also include the adequate melody/chord/timing information. and never start the production until the whole song is written

3.12.21  9:33 pm   Do you prioritize the quality of the content you make over the quantity of it?

      no

3.12.21  7:05 pm   What made you want to start making music

      music

3.12.21  6:38 pm   what, in your humble opinion, is a complete breakfast?

      lunch

3.12.21  4:03 pm   ive been writing down all of the lyrics that randomly materialize in my brain and putting chords to them, but after those inital lyrics i cant figure out how to continue them into something bigger. how do you suggest doing that

      this may or not be what you want to hear, but you're gonna have to make something up

3.12.21  3:34 pm   what rhymes with orange

      forwards

3.12.21  2:44 pm   can you answer this question with an already existing answer

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes
